channel.title: My FPS Creator First Game project
channel.description:
If you want to test it its my new horror Indie game Made from fps creator :D hope yall like it and support me on it :D If you wish to download and test it here is the link : http://uppit.com/zss1cmxecec5/beta_test.RAR Also warning it takes awhile for it to load
A pic right here.
Fix's Fixed the black gloves now go leather re-added some new guns.. And more maps... in the next beta test you will see all the features
[URL=http://minus.com/lQt4T3qZijjnW][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jQt4T3qZijjnW.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: My FPS Creator First Game project
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

After doing making some progress with the game I’ve decided it won’t multiplayer until I am very good with whatever software I’d be using at the time. Sorry for the high jack I just thought I’d say it here just to clear things up.
Sorry Dx.

Read full topic

item.title: My FPS Creator First Game project
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:29, topic:510876”][quote author=kidgoku4522 link=topic=629121.msg4271025#msg4271025 date=1364525774]

I can’t afford a licence hence why I’m using free stuff lol.

hence why there is google
[/quote]
Don’t try to be a smart arse. I never asked you how to get it, did I? If somebody knows how a link to a good crack then yeah, I’ll happily use it but it doesn’t make a big difference to me as this is for learning purposes and I can use this for my project at college rather than my crappy game maker game lol.[/quote]
Erm i wasn’t the real word i said got blocked so
the pirate bay is where u go for a crack

item.title: My FPS Creator First Game project
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:25, topic:510876”][quote author=jal knight link=topic=629121.msg4270638#msg4270638 date=1364504290]

I hate game maker lul, it’s so boring.

Since I’ve got nothing to do apart from revise, play xbox & get drunk I’m going to use Unity (the free one ) and attempt to make my own multiplayer FPS. I’m going to take it in steps, watch a few tuts do the work and just hopefully keep building and adding to it until and hopefully I have produced an okay FPS that is multiplayer. All the models I’ll use etc atm I don’t intend on making, they’ll be free. I’ve got some from demos and I downloaded a few browsing the web :D. Considering I don’t know much this could take a while ;p.

Make a progress thread sometime. I would actually like to see how long it is going to take.
[/quote]
Okii, I’ll make one when I’ve made a decent amount of progress. I’m taking logs of what I’m doing so it’ll add be dated so yous won’t be missing out on anything :D.[/quote]
id say making a game in with a unreal engine its really worth it
the results Apb reloaded

Read full topic

item.title: My FPS Creator First Game project
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:21, topic:510876”][quote author=kidgoku4522 link=topic=629121.msg4270583#msg4270583 date=1364500215]

What are you using to make this?

fps creator paid edition
[/quote]
Sell your license. You’ll never learn anything from drag’n’drop creators[/quote]I started game making with Game Maker and right now I’m working on a procedurally-generated voxel engine in C# that uses my own models and animations format that are made with my own editors. Don’t just blatantly say something you know nothing about.

(I apologize for hijacking your thread. I’m trying to get a point across. Keep on learning and eventually you won’t even need this program)

Read full topic

item.source: My FPS Creator First Game project

item.title: My FPS Creator First Game project
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:13, topic:510876”]I don’t know where to start with this. The GUI is terrible, the lighting engine looks ridiculous, there’s no phong on that zombie making his polygons stand out from a mile away, the textures look very low-res on the walls and floor compared to everything else, and this is just from the picture. The file is 116MB and I’m sure it’s nowhere near done, so that’s a lot more than it needs to be.
You would be so much better off starting from scratch and making something decent than using a horrible game-making kit.[/quote]
I messed up on that Because i was trying to get the gun models right -_ - found a easier way to do that.
But I fixed the zombie textures and the glowing effects of it LOL.
Now im struggling with the lag of it handling 3 levels of 1 map so far :l

Read full topic
item.source: My FPS Creator First Game project

item.title: My FPS Creator First Game project
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I don’t know where to start with this. The GUI is terrible, the lighting engine looks ridiculous, there’s no phong on that zombie making his polygons stand out from a mile away, the textures look very low-res on the walls and floor compared to everything else, and this is just from the picture. The file is 116MB and I’m sure it’s nowhere near done, so that’s a lot more than it needs to be.
You would be so much better off starting from scratch and making something decent than using a horrible game-making kit.

Read full topic
